title: Son Of Satan - Steve Gerber
description:
Steve Gerber&#039;s run in the mid-70s writing about the Son of Satan. I&#039;ve included a couple of issues that Gerber didn&#039;t write due to them being origin-related. Also included are a couple of issues of Howard the Duck and The Defenders that Gerber wrote in which the Son of Satan guest stars.

Thanks to scanners and uploaders. I pulled most of these off of a Son of Satan torrent. Check it out that large torrent if you want to read more about him.

Anybody have a seed for the now-dead Defenders torrent? Lot of good issues and Gerber work in that.
